en: Someone is asking for a quick contract job done in a field you have intermediate skill in. It would be an extra source of cash, but would take you away from your project for a few days. Take it up?
It hurts your productivity, and you find it draining to work on a project you don't care as much about. But the money sure is good!
You turn it down. Now's the time to make your dreams happen, not someone else's.
